content.raw:
We should probably give a warning about disk space requirements. I haven't gone through all the steps, but I started with a fresh Windows 8.1 virtual machine, then I installed Visual Studio 2013 express Windows Desktop, then downloaded and extracted the zip files hosted on packages.osrfoundation.org, and my virtual machine is already over 30 GB in size.

What is the size of the `gz-ws` folder for people who are farther along?
